name: Flippers
description:
After some heavy research we were so fascinated by the study of how dolphins can have Alzheimer, that we decided on dedicating our great minds in creating this scientifically accurate game of how dolphin with Alzheimer can have such a troubling life.  

A partly proof of the research - https://www.ox.ac.uk/news/2017-10-23-dolphin-brains-show-signs-alzheimer%E2%80%9...

Game summary - Just a dolphin with Alzheimer who con forgetting how to walk partly. 

Instructions  -Arrow Keys for movement  and press 'R' to reset
